condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Strengthen COVID-19 risk communication and community engagement focusing on the most vulnerable in high-risk communities.

description.narrative: Effective WASH preparedness services and response for COVID-19 emergency-affected populations were delivered in line with UNICEF's core commitments for children in humanitarian action focusing on ensuring access to critical water and sanitation services and knowledge on proper hygiene practice to protect vulnerable children and their families and reduce risk of contamination and infection for more than 300,000 people. Since March 2020, UNICEF Jordan targeted high risk and vulnerable families with equitable WASH services and distributions of critical hygiene items to ensure that children and their families are supported to protect themselves against the possible transmission and spread of COVID-19 | Status:On-track | As-of Date:26/08/2020

title.narrative: Number of people reached on COVID-19 through messaging on prevention and access to services (covid-19 HPM)
Number of people reached with critical WASH supplies (including hygiene items) and services (covid-19 HPM)
